umbTextpage.bodyText:
ICP registration operation analysis

Final renewal date is July 2017

Registration type

Initial registration
Original registration in Azure Cloud: Add a website, registration changes, registration sign off
Original registration not in Azure Cloud: newly added website, newly added access

Registration of specific operations

1. Registration requirements for each province
Before registering, first know your own local administration’s registration requirements, this will make your audit by your local administration go smoothly.
Download all provincial administration special requirements

2. Registration of specific operations
2.1 Login account
Login websitehttps://icp.cloud.21vianet.com, download account number and click Login.


2.2 Sign on registration
If you have already registered and need to delete information, you can cancel registration operations. Go to the home page and select “cancel registration.”

To skip to the page, select the corresponding cancelation page

After confirming cancellation, fill in the relevant information and “save”

Return to the homepage “cancel registration information” and tab to continue submitting a registration.


2.3 Registration actions after submitting registration information

  1. After submitting registration, we will conduct an audit within 2 business days and will let you know by mail or phone if there are any problems. Please make sure your phone is available and check your mail.
  2. After registration is completed, the administration will notify the host’s responsible person by mail and text.
    Additionally: The audit period for local provincial administrations is estimated. (Note: the audit period is ultimately up to the administration)
    3 Weeks：Gansu, Yunnan
    2 Weeks: Beijing, Zhejiang, Hubei, Tianjin, Jiangxi, Guangxi, Hebei, Heilongjiang, Inner Mongolia
    1 Week: Guangdong, Jiangsu, Sichuan, Henan, Shanxi, Anhui, Fujian, Guizhou, Liaoning, Hainan, Hunan, Xinjiang, Shanxi, Ningxia, Chongqing
    3 Days: Shanghai
  3. After the registration information is submitted: you can check on the progress of registration through the registration module.


4. If the administrative audit is not passed, we will call and mail you to inform you of the reason and assist you in submitting additional information. Please ensure your phone is available and check your mail.
umbTextpage.pageTitle: Original registration in Azure Cloud - Registration cancellation | Azure
umbTextpage.metaDescription: The ICP registration type is the registration cancellation process for an original registration in the Azure Cloud
